task.title: Creating a New Project
task.shortdesc: This topic describes how to create a new project in the Radiant software.

taskbody.context:
A project is a collection of all files necessary to create and download your design to the selected device. The New Project wizard guides you through the steps of specifying a project name and location, selecting a target device, and adding existing sources to the new project.Do not place more than one project in the same directory.
To create a new project, follow these steps:

step.cmd: From the Radiant main menu, click the New Project button, or choose File New Project .
